
describe-elastic-ips
********************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Describes an instance's Elastic IP addresses .


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws opsworks describe-elastic-ips
     [--instance-id <value>]
     [--ips <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--instance-id"  (string)
   The instance ID.

"--ips"  (list of string)
   An array of Elastic IP addresses to be described.

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]
